Buildings: purpose of use, and physical and functional attributes (Laajalahti bay area)

Laajalahti bay area buildings, categorized by use and visualized according to their physical and functional attributes, using Helsinki and Espoo datasets updated as of November 16, 2023. (See more)

Isochrones: opportunity for optional, necessary, and social activities (Helsinki, Espoo, Vantaa +)

Distribution of places for performing optional, necessary, and social activities, following from Gehl, within travel-time isochrones. [To do: extend to also count public transportation stops, by type, as a second chart](See more)
